item.title: Date: 8/28/24 PWSID# 3303111 Morgantown Utility Board (MUB)
item.description: Date: 8/28/24 PWSID# 3303111 Morgantown Utility Board (MUB) has issued a precautionary boil water advisory for approximately 41 customers at 101 to 1003 Lakeview Estate Townhomes. Once service is restored, affected customers will be advised to boil their water before consumption until the boil water advisory is lifted. When the system recovers, MUB will be collecting water quality samples in the area of the outage, which requires a minimum of 24 hours for analysis. Customers and the appropriate agencies will be notified in the same manner once the analysis is complete and the advisory can be lifted. In the meantime, please reach out to us with any questions or additional information that may be needed. Thank you.

item.title: Date Issued: 8/26/24 Date Lifted: 8/28/24 PWSID# 3303111 Mor
item.description: Date Issued: 8/26/24 Date Lifted: 8/28/24 PWSID# 3303111 Morgantown Utility Board (MUB) has lifted a precautionary boil water advisory for approximately 35 customers at 2995-3083 Point Marion Road, 2236 Meadows Drive, 50 Harmony Drive, and 2103 & 2105 Circle Drive. Results of the water quality testing have confirmed that the water quality meets drinking water standards. Therefore, there is no further need to boil water prior to consumption. Customers will be notified of the advisory lifting in the same manner as they were for the issuance. Please reach out to us with any questions or additional information that may be needed. Thank you.
